options.--path=:
Directories where store shared files
eg: chfs --path=D:\
    chfs --path="C:\Program Files"
options.--port=:
HTTP listening port(Default is 80)
eg: chfs --port=8080
options.--log=: Log directory. Empty value will disable log
options.--allow=:
Allowed IPv4 addresses(Allow any address by default)
 White list mode: "listitem1[,listitem2,...]"
 More help info by running "chfs --help"
options.--rule=:
Access rules(anybody can access any thing by default).
List defines like:"USER:PWD:MASK[:DIR:MASK...][|...]":
 "192.168.1.2-192.168.1.10,192.169.1.222" allows this 10 addresses.
Black list mode: "not(listitem1[,listitem2,...])"
 "not(192.168.1.2-192.168.1.10,192.169.1.222)" bans this 10 addresses!
options.--file=: A configuration file which overwrites & enhence the settings
